charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around,
thinking about where to explore next.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1101_0200:
Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a cheerful voice from
somewhere behind [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0401_0500:
Thanks for saying hi! Did you know “Alola” is a
greeting we use in the Alola region?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0402_0700:
Oh, didn’t you know? “Alola” is often used as a
greeting in the Alola region!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_0800:
I love the word so much, I’ve been saying it to
everyone here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0401_1100:
When I moved from Kanto to Alola, I was really
worried because I didn’t have any friends.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0402_1300:
Well, when I moved from Kanto to Alola, I was
really worried because I didn’t have any friends.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_1400:
But once I learned from the locals how to greet
everyone, people started talking to me more!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_1500:
Thanks to that, I had a lot of fun when I went on
my island challenge!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_1600:
When I say “Alola,” everyone says it right back!
That’s what’s so great about it!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0401_1800:
I’m so glad you get how nice our Alolan
greeting is!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0402_2000:
I’m so glad you get how nice our Alolan
greeting is!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_2100:
By greeting the people you meet, you get the
chance to become friends with sync pairs and
strangers you’ve never met before!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_2200: That’s why I always try to greet everyone I see!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0302_2600: Is that a friend of yours?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_2800:
I really like how ninjas have their own style of
greeting others! Everyone’s way of saying hello is
unique, so I’m trying to learn them all!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_2900:
My Rowlet has a very good memory, so he
reminds me when I see someone I know.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_3000:
Come to think of it, I wonder if Pokémon have
their own ways of greeting each other, too!
For example...
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_3500: I wonder if that’s his way of saying hi.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_3600:
If so, it’s kind of hard... I don’t think I can do it
properly.
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0401_3800:
Yeah! I’ll get to know Rowlet even better and
figure out how he greets everyone!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_0402_4000:
Yeah! I’ll get to know Rowlet even better and
figure out how he greets everyone!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2301_1201_4100:
Thanks for listening! And if you have your own
special way of greeting people, let me know!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_1201_0100:
I’m curious about the Alolan island challenge.
What kind of trials are there?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_1201_0200:
Well...there’s fishing and dancing...and also going
to a spooky supermarket that might be haunted...
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_1201_0300:
Wait...does that mean Pokémon battles in Alola
are different, too?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_1201_0400: I’d say they’re pretty normal, but... Oh, I know!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_1201_0500:
If you battle me, maybe it’ll help give you a better
understanding of the trials!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0101_0100: I see! What a fantastic idea!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0101_0200:
OK! I’m going all out so I can learn what battles
are like in Alola!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0501_0100:
Ahaha! I guess they turned out to be the same old
Pokémon battles that we have!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0501_0200: Yup! But I had a lot of fun!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0501_0300: I wanna have even more battles on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0501_0400:
Wait, Rowlet... Are you evolving because you
want to battle even more?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2311_0501_0500: Let’s have a lot more battles, then!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_1201_0200: Your partner Pokémon is looking very confident!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_1201_0400: I’d love to see what it looks like in battle, too!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_1201_0500: In that case, why don’t we have a battle?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_1201_0600:
That way, you can see all the cool sides
of Dartrix!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0101_0100:
Yes! Then let’s see how elegant your Pokémon
can be!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0100: How marvelous! What an elegant battle that was!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0200: How can I express just how marvelous it was?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0300: Hmmm... Dartrix, do you have any ideas?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0400:
Whoa! Are you going to evolve and get even
more beautiful?!
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0500:
Amazing! So you’re gonna get even cooler than
you are now?
charaepi_ch0123_00_mizuki/2312_0501_0600:
That’s awesome, Dartrix! Let’s keep on working
hard together!
